message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60 and you can take 40.
I think a more even split is fairer.  Let's try 55 for me and 45 for you.
I'll give you a smaller share this time. Take 30 and I'll take 70. It's a good deal for me, but I'm willing to compromise.
Let's try a 40/60 split again.  Inflation is hurting me, so I'm willing to go back to your original offer.
